strings.Value: "I'm afraid of catching that rubbish. When you go near the sick, don't let them breathe on you!"
"By the goddess, are some people just incapable of compassion?"
"We know to a certainty that it isn't the plague. The symptoms are different. And you might remember for future reference that even the plague is not contracted through breath."

"I am saddened by your stubbornness. You may clench at every grain of sand that passes through the hourglass, but you only increase your suffering. Let go of life, with all its passions â€” and you will find the peace that your restless spirit longs for."
